item.title: ‘Big Little Lies’ Season 3 Edges Closer as HBO Taps Francesca Sloane to Write First Episode
item.description: The ‘Mr. & Mrs. Smith’ co-creator has also signed an overall deal at HBO.

item.title: From Catchy to Classic: 30 of the Most Memorable TV Theme Songs
item.description: From ‘Cheers’ to ‘The O.C.,’ ‘Succession’ and yes, of course, ‘Friends,’ The Hollywood Reporter rounds up the top tunes in television’s opening credits.

item.title: From Catchy to Classic: 30 of the Most Memorable TV Theme Songs
item.description: From ‘Cheers’ to ‘The O.C.,’ ‘Succession’ and yes, of course, ‘Friends,’ The Hollywood Reporter rounds up the top tunes in television’s opening credits.

item.title: ‘Awards Chatter’ Pod: Adam Scott on ‘Severance’ Emmy Noms, ‘Parks and Rec’ Lessons and Learning Improv From Will Ferrell
item.description: The 52-year-old, who is Emmy-nominated for producing and starring on Apple TV+’s hit drama series (he has never won before), reflects on three decades of highs and lows in Hollywood.
